column1: this product is so hydrating i could not believe it! i have been using this for 2 weeks now and have notice a huge difference in my skin.it so much brighter,smoother, supple, and even toned. it is so refreshing and lightweight at the same time. the mist is VERY STRONG so 2 pumps is all you need for it to cover your face.

This gel mist was very refreshing each time I used it. I love how refreshing it made my face look after a long day. I found myself wanting to use it more often when the temperature was warmer. It definitely helped to cool my face down as well as help me face to feel more hydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Sheild Gel Mist. Its so simple to use and its effective. Simply use it on a clean face spray it once or twice. It gives you a nice boost of refreshment. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I live in Miami Florida and weather here is very hot. I loved carrying the Neutrogena gel mist, it kept me cool and fresh. I have dry skin and it helped me feel hydrated all day with just a couple of sprays throughout the day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is the perfect mist for a no make up day, the mist is refreshing. It's a bit sticky but it's not bothering at all. This is the best pick-me-up during my busy day. Keeps my skin glowy and hydrated. Just use your hands to massage the product on your face and it gives you the cooling affect while still getting the full benefits of this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It's been one week that I've been using this product. My skin was dry in the T area and my nose oily. After using this product 2 times a day, my skin feels moisturized, no grease. The product smells good and I haven't had problems with any reaction. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this product! It works get on my dry skin and it also smells get to compared to other products I have tried. And it's not heavy on my skin either. I highly recommend neutrogena hydro boost city shield gel mist! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Mist was too strong and left my skin feeling tacky. I did try it with no makeup, on top of, and under makeup and no matter how I tried it just was not something I enjoyed. After the "mist" initially settles there is a small period of time where you feel refreshed before it leaves a slightly sticky film on the skin. Of all the ways I tried it I will say it worked best for me under my makeup. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product! It is lightweight, refreshing and smells really good. It leaves my face feeling soft, more toned and quenched. This is especially helpful because I live in the Northeast where the winters leave my skin feeling dry. All you need is two sprays so the bottle should last awhile. I know once I run out I'll buy another one! Highly recommended!

I have never used a mist before, but I tried this out since my skin gets pretty dry during the winters. Definitely feels moisturizing, but I only use it on the weekends when I'm not in a rush. I feel like it takes too long to fully absorb/dry when I'm rushing on weekday mornings before work. Also seems like a higher price point than what I would expect for a Neutrogena product.

The new Neutrogena Hydro boost shield gel mist honestly seems like a waste of money. I think you would get the same effect just spraying your face with water. My skin didn't feel any more hydrated then normal except right after I used the product and my face was still wet. I also think its weird spray something on my face and it felt uncomfortable. The only time I think I might use this would be a hot summer day when I outside and I want to cool off a little. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I liked this product. It made my skin feel so soft and refreshed.
It works well and has none of the unpleasant sensation or odor in some hydration products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I thought I would like it but when I put it it felt sticky in my face and oily at the same time and didn't like the way it sprays it's like they are trowing water in the face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Neutrogena® Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist -Everyone should have this amazing product, especially if you have dry and flaky skin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Absolutely love the Neutrogena hydroboost city shield facial gel mist! This mist, is a must!!! Amazing ingredients, high-quality product. Extremely hydrating without clogging pores. Great for dry, winter weather skin! Apply under makeup before moisturizer and again after makeup application then fan your skin till dry and watch your makeup melt seamlessly with your skin! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The packaging looked appeasing and the color of the solution was very appealing. When spritzing on it covers the whole face on one spritz. Feels a bit sticking at first but drys very fast. Feels hydrating like it supposed to do. Has a nice texture when applied to face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena® Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist is a great affordable way of keeping your skin moisturized throughout the day. I love the fact that is mist because it's refreshing. Using it once in the morning normal provides all day coverage. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I can never complain with this brand! It's absolutely amazing! This mist is great, it has a great fixation, the mist is lighy and with a nice subtle scent. My face definitely feels refreshed, hydrated and energized everytime I use the product. And with thus harsh winter weather, it has helped so much. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was pleasantly surprised how well it hydrated my face. I started with dry patchy spots. Within a few days after using it three to four times a day. My face became super soft and smooth. This product is definitely something I'm going to use from now to keep my face hydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Refreshing spray for an overall good feeling. The gel spray is a great idea, the only issue I had with the product was the mist was not a mist it was a very heavy spray of gel on my face. Once rubbed in it was blissful! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist was a refreshing and cooling gel mist that I used multiple times throughout the day. It was hydrating my skin before and after I applied my make up for the day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like how this product smells and feels on my face. It definitely is moisturizing. My face feels soft as well. My only problem is I probably won't use this product too often because my face is not that dry. I also do not wear makeup either. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I didn't see a big difference in this product then some of thee cheap and in expensive products that I've used it's not the worst but not the best either. Really thought it would've been better since it is name brand. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Have never used a product like this before. I almways need to moisturize my face after a shower and usually used lotion which would leave my skin almost feeling greasy. This gel mist really was not only refreshing but left my skin smelling and feeling fresh and moisturized. I will never go back to using lotion on my face!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like that it is a gel mist, it makes it easier and faster to apply. I like the way it smells and how refreshing it feels. It absorbs fast and doesn't leave my skin looking or feeling greasy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist is my new favorite. With a couple sprays it makes your face feel so nice and hydrated. It smells great you can use it as much as you need to. Love it it's a great product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The product was overall pretty effortless to use. It went on easy and had a very clean scent. My issue was I didn't get anything out of using the product. My skin did feel or look any different after it was applied. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just got this and honestly, it is amazing! I've been looking for a nice moisturizer and this one is Awesome. I like that it absorbs nicely, and it doesn't leave my face sticky or oily, it smells nice. Love this, refreshes my face instantly. Keeps it feeling fresh and smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I spray my face a facial gel mist loaded with antioxidants and herbal extracts after I put my make-up, a skin protectant that suppose to give my skin a healthy radiant look despite the everyday stress. And guess what, when I got home from work, I noticed a glow on my face when I checked it despite having a long day. I like it. I recommend this product and might buy some more. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a really nice mist for anyone who wants to refresh and hydrate their face. This absorbs instantly and be be applied under or over makeup. This has everything I want Hyaluronic acid, antioxidants and botanical extracts that are keeping my skin moist and smooth. Great product to add to the hydro boost line. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love that it's a gel mist. It smells amazing and it feels refreshing on my face. It leaves my face feeling moisturized and fresh. I like that you can use it under your makeup to keep your face refreshed and moisturized. You don't have to use a lot, for me 1-2 squirts do just fine and get my whol face. I will definitely be buying more when j run out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I did like it. But there was nothing special. My rose water spray does the same thing. I have only been using it a week but I will continue to use it. Hopefully I see something different my rose water doesnt do for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist is incredible! It literally makes my skin feel super hydrated and very soft. When I need a refreshment on my skin I just spritz some on my face and it instantly feels cool and fresh. I put it over my makeup to give my face a more Dewey look and it's wonderful. I really enjoy using this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've recently been using Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield facial gel mist! I absolutely love this product!

My face feels really good after using this! The best word that I can think of is refreshing! It feels so very refreshing on my skin! I really like the way it feels, and it leaves my skin feeling really soft to. It feels like I just washed my face, even if I didn't! I will buy this product regularly and I would recommend it to anyone gladly! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist is refreshing! I like to keep it in the refrigerator at work and give myself a spray when the day is dragging me down. I really enjoy how it blends in nicely with the skin and doesnt leave a sticky residue behind! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have never tried anything like this and I must say its amazing. I loved it so much I told my husband to use it. It gives a nice fresh feeling. Only downside it it leaves a tacky feeling until it dries completely. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist is light, refreshing and smells amazing. Love how this feels on my skin. Just spritz twice over your face for all day hydration, without greasy feel. Makes my face feel so moisturized and soft. Love it. Definitely worth trying if your skin is on the dryer side like mine. Highly recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist feels so great on my skin and makes my skin LOOK great. My skin can run dry in the winter and using this gel mist before my makeup keeps my face healthily hydrated all throughout the day. I think it also helps keep my makeup looking fresh due to eliminating dry cakey patches. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This stuff seems pretty good because it makes my skin feel firmer, and also has some moisturizing qualities to it. It's refreshing and I like to use it over my regular moisturizer. I don't care for the smell though, to be quite honest. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I feel like the facial mist was very refreshing with a nice, breeze like scent. It helped hydrate my face and didn't interfere with any of my makeup. It was easy to use and apply. I would definitely recommend. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the feel of my skin after using this product for a week. Nice fresh scent. Healthier looking skin works great under makeup or applied over makeup. Still using up my bottle but will keep this beauty stocked in my purse. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Bought this at ulta with the gel cream with spf. This spray has alcohol as it's third ingredient. Not only that my face will NOT stop itching since I began using it. I will have to go see dermatologist if this doesn't resolve. I really wanted to love this product but so far hate it and it's not like it was cheap either.

The product comes in a nice pacakaging, it can be worn alone or under makeup. I haven't tried it under makeup yet but when I used it alone it was nice. My skin felt hydrated. Love it. Will definitely try it under makeup too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena hydro boost city shield gel mist made my face feel super fresh and clean! One spritz and It feels fresh. It also made my face feel smooth and soft and refreshed. Highly recommend!!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

So this product did a good job of making my skin feel refreshed, however my only complaint is that it kind of felt likea a layer of film on my face after several hours. It's good for my skin and easy to use so I will deal with that only issue [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used the product and it has exceeded my expectations. I love how refresh my skin look and feel. I have been getting alot of compliments lately since using the product. I definitely recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It's certainly refreshing, and moisturizing. I tried it under and over my makeup and love it! Under makeup I light rub it in. If I'm using it as a mid day moisture boost, I spray it and then lightly dab/tap it into my skin. Really does help my skin stay moisturized and plump looking. Also make my skin look more glowy (I know that isn't a word) naturally. Something I'll definitely use daily! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

While the feel of my skin after using Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel is better and feels moisturized, I really, REALLY dislike the application of the product. I think it could be applied better by hand rather than spraying onto your face. If following directions, one or two spritzs doesn't really give you FULL coverage. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the smell, it is very refreshing and calming. It makes my face feels refreshed, however, I don't see any physical changes in my skin. I would recommend this product to be used on hot humid days. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product just in time. My face was really needing the extra boost from the cold, blistery winter weather! The gel mist gave my face the refresher that it needed. It definitely gave my skin the hydration it was desperately needed! I already recommend this to a few friends. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The stuff is really nice for refreshing your skin when it feels a little dry or you just need a little dewy glow to your face after applying makeup. I like the fact that it is providing a barrier against some of the pollution and hazards that might damage your skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Really enjoy reviewing Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist!! It really gave my face a replenished and very hydrated feel after being out in the harsh cold elements of the East Coast. Love the fact that it also contains SPF which will help in the hot, humid, summer days here always. Overall, I really liked the product and will be using on a as needed basis!! Thanks for the free sample. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

So far I really love this product. I live in Minnesota and the winter months are very tough on my skin leaving it dry. This goes on nice and thick and dries really quickly. It has a very clean, pleasant smell, but not overpowering. I have not had any issues with breakouts from using this product. I am recommending this to all of my friends and coworkers. I will definitely be buying this again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I enjoy the refreshing feeling I get when using this product. I also like the fragrance. I think it instantly helps with moisture, especially needed in Colorado. I like that I can apply it pretty much at any time of the day, on or under makeup. Thanks for letting me trial this! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was pleasantly surprised by the Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist because at first before I tried it I was expecting it to be sticky, it was not. It was very refreshing and it was like my skin just soaks it up every time I use it! It doesn't leave a yucky feeling afterwards which is something I was expecting it to do but I love this product very much! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena hydro boost city shield mist is amazing. I woke up and was dreary barely facing the sunshine, and than I sprayed this on my face. It woke me up! Like coming out of the shower, I was aware at 7 in the morning. It was great. I use this every morning now. More than that, it refreshes and hydrates my skin like there's no tommorow. It seeps into my pores and makes me feel alive and awake and clean. Wondering, refreshing product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I JUST LOVE IT IS IS VERY REFRESHING AND I ALSO LOVE THE BRAND NEUTROGENA, BUT WHAT I LOVE THE MOST IS THAT WAS FREE FROM THE HOME TESTER CLUB AND I LOVE FREE IS IT MY FAVORITE WORD, THIS DAY YOU CAN NOT GET NOTHING FROM FREE WITH THE EXECEPCION OF HOME TESTER CLUB, THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR BEEN SO WONDERFUL [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product so much! It is so easy to incorporate into my daily beauty routine! I have recommended it to everyone I know because of its ease and how well it works. I use it after I shower and throughout the day as a makeup refresher! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It feels really refreshing and moisturizing on the skin. The sprayer gives a nice light even wide spray. I love that it has spf! It makes a great setting spray and an even better refreshing spray. My skin can be beautifully moisturized in the morning but will turn dry and make my makeup look patchy by noon. The spray brought it right back to a beautiful smooth application [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this is a really good product. It does keep my skin refreshed and hydrated but that's without makeup. It's a little sticky and I wouldn't wear it over my makeup,but other than that it keeps skin feeling refreshed and hydrated. Would recommend. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I always find myself needing more hydration during the day so I was excited to try this mist. The scent is pleasant and the formula itself is light. It absorbs nicely into the skin without needing to be rubbed in. The one issue that I did have is that the mist is a bit heavy so you need to hold the bottle back far, a finer spray would have been nicer. Overall it is hydrating, easy to use and didn't mess up my makeup. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am a 32 year old mother of 3 and a wife. I have lived a lot of life in those years. Half were hard. Half has been full of travel and memories. I use the tanning bed.. Ive got some wear on my skin. This makes my skin not just look hydrated but, it FEELS hydrated. I am in love with this gel mist. Its a must have, young or old-er.. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist is really good. It didn't interfere with my make up and keeps my face feeling refreshed outside. It really is a BOOST like the name says! Looking forward to taking it on trips, too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Based on the title I was worried about trying this product. I thought it was going to be a thicker spray but in fact it was light and airy. Very refreshing especially in the FL heat, humidity, and congestion. I noticed a difference when washing my face at night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I lpve this product so easy to use and sprays a mist that is so light you cant even tell that its on i used it before applying my makeup but you can apply after also. It made my face feel like i just wokeup and feel fresh thats what this product does it made me feel refreshed at the end of the day and you dont have to keep using it iver and over again only if you really want to. I love this product and will continue to purchase it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This facial mist is refreshing, lightly fragrant, leaving a very fresh feeling on the skin. Winter in a cold climate can make it very difficult to keep skin hydrated, and this mist feels like a nice, even mist refresher on my face. Most often, I use it before make-up is applied, but it is versatile and can be used before make-up application or after. It is a nice treat for the skin, I would recommend it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This was a fantastic product. This product was very light and airy. I do not wear makeup so I did not cover it with anything and it was still very light. It was indeed refreshing and allowed me to recharge after sitting in front of a computer for hours at work. Left my face extremely soft as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Mist is very cooling and hydrating. It has a pleasant smell and is convenient to carry around. It's been great to have, with the drying winter weather, but I think it would be equally as nice in the summer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Gel Mist was refreshing to my skin. However, I found that it doesn't take the place if your moisturizer in your skincare routine. But it does feel good on my skin when I used it as a moisture refresher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Tye mist Helped revive and improve the look of my pollution-stressed skin. Read up on this product yet there were times it was sticky and the product made my skin look amazing. However the product left a thick layer that just sat on my skin until I washed my face a night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product worked really well. I used it throughout the day to freshen my makeup up. It kept me looking dewy, not oily. I also liked the fact that it dried super fast. I've used it have my daily skincare routine and have noticed my skin looking brighter and more youthful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It felt great when I sprayed it on my face, but I found no lasting effects. I didn't feel the product even just 5 minutes later. I think it would be great during a hot day, or after a big workout, but it isn't a product that I found to be beneficial to my face/skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

For someone who has struggled with keeping their skin hydrated for most of their life this Hydro Boost line is a life saver. I love this spray since it can be applied on or under makeup throughout the day for day-long hydration. Also this smells great! Just spritz twice over your face for all day hydration! Best paired with Neutrogena Hydro Boost moisturizers and cleansers. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist seemed like it would fit my lifestyle very well. I was hoping to have a quick and easy spray of mist to hydrate and refresh my face over the course of the day. Unfortunately, the scent is too strong, and lingers through the morning; and the spray leaves my face (especially my lips) feeling sticky, rather than refreshed. This occurs whether I have previously applied makeup or not. Not the right product for me! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena ® Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist is a must have for your skin! This mist has a great scent and is so light weight, not what you would think a gel spray would be. It absorbs quickly and hydrates within seconds. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had high hopes for the facial mist, but I don't feel like it moisturizers my face that well. I feel like I need more than 1 to 2 sprays as it suggests. If I do one spray, it doesn't feel like it coats my face well. There's also a tingling feeling that I don't really care for with this product. I will continue to use it to see how it performs over the next few weeks. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product acts as a setting spray and a moisturizer. It smells nice, and absorbs quickly, leaving your skin soft and glowing. I also like knowing that I'm wearing an added level of protection against pollution. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist is a great product to use, whether with or without makeup. I mostly used it at night right before bedtime. After cleaning my face, I would spray the mist on my face and let it moisturize my skin while I sleep [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am still kinda on the fence about this product. I like the effects of the product but I am also not a huge fan of how it actually feels in my skin after I apply it. Maybe it will grow more on me over time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love having this especially with the recent pollution increase by the SoCal wild fires .. very refreshing

Gave my skin a great glow on top of looking supple. Didnt leave my skin stick and dryed fast. It was great to use it threw out the day. Gave my skin the drink it needed during florida hot days. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Overall I liked Neutrogena hydro boost city shield gel mist , it is very refreshing but my only fear is I have to spray it with closed eyes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It is quite refreshing and decent smell. It leaves the skin very hydrated. Also it is antioxidants rich which is a plus. Leaves skin amazingly young looking. Thanks for this wonderful product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Gel Mist makes you feel refreshed after using it. I like how the the cool mist feels, and the smell is nice too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the way it felt when I sprayed it on. It tighten up my face when it started drying. It's refreshing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love this product. It left my skin feeling really soft and hydrated. It works perfect under makeup as well as without make up. It's not oily at all and I like that! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I'm not fond of spraying a mist in my face ,I just dont see the use for it ,it made my face feel sticky. This product was not for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This felt very light on my sskin but I noticed it felt much softer and smoother after using it for a few days. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really liked this face mist it was so refreshing when it hit your face. I felt happy and relaxed it is a great product!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I was very impressed how this worked and how beautiful my face looked and felt i have already bought one [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love the Hydro Boost City Shield. I apply it over my makeup and it makes me look so refreshed and gives an awesome glow. I love this stuff! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

it was easy to apply dries quickly and leaves my skin feeling soft.
my skin felt hydrated and super moist [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
